name: ensembl
description: Ensembl genome browser â€” gene search, lookup, and transcript retrieval

tools.name: ensembl_search_genes
tools.description: Fuzzy search for genes in Ensembl by name or symbol. Returns ranked candidates with Ensembl Gene IDs.

tools.name: ensembl_get_gene
tools.description: Lookup a gene by Ensembl Gene ID (e.g., ENSG00000012048). Returns full gene record.

tools.name: ensembl_get_transcript
tools.description: Lookup a transcript by Ensembl Transcript ID. Returns full transcript record.
